alert.note: Alert for Onondaga (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 21 at 3:18PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Onondaga County through 345 PM EDT... At 316 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Camillus moving northeast at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Syracuse, Clay, Cicero, Van Buren, Baldwinsville, North Syracuse, Solvay, Liverpool, Jordan and Amboy. This includes the following highway exits... Interstate 90 between 35 and 39. New York Interstate 81 between 22, 23A and B and 31. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
